title: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description:
Bug 101187 - Localization key can't be blank when adding. 

Description: If the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart. 

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Leave the key field blank while adding the localization.

OB: The externalized text is not displayed in the chart.
EB: The externalized text should be displayed in the chart.
SR: 1. Enter the externalized text in the chart title field before adding the localization. 

2. Save the localization and verify that the externalized text is displayed correctly in the chart.
